Cbriver is a bidirectional bridge between the everything2 chatterbox and irc.

Whatever anyone speaks in the chatterbox, cbriver copies to the irc channel #cbriver on the server irc.freenode.net.

Cbriver also allows you to talk on the chatterbox simply by writing to an irc channel.

For instructions on how to use cbriver, see the Cbstream and cbriver FAQ

Now announced in a node: [cbriver].
